EastScarp_Village.Name: East Scarp Village
EastScarp_Village.Description: [PLACEHOLDER - Main village area of East Scarp]

EastScarp_Crossing.Name: East Scarp Crossing
EastScarp_Crossing.Description: [PLACEHOLDER - Crossing/clearing house area with bus stop and minecart]

EastScarp_DeepMountains.Name: Deep Mountains
EastScarp_DeepMountains.Description: [PLACEHOLDER - Mountain area in East Scarp region]

EastScarp_ZuzuBurb.Name: Zuzu Suburb (Academic District)
EastScarp_ZuzuBurb.Description: [PLACEHOLDER - Suburban area of Zuzu City with academic buildings]

AideenHome.Name: Aideen's Home
AideenHome.Description: Aideen's home near the center of East Scarp, between Victoria's house and the vet clinic. She lives here with her cat Baron Munchington. The house has two spare rooms that she attempts to rent out, and is surrounded by a little garden.

VictoriaHome.Name: Victoria's House
VictoriaHome.Description: [PLACEHOLDER - Victoria's house in East Scarp, located near Aideen's home]

VetClinic.Name: Vet Clinic
VetClinic.Description: [PLACEHOLDER - Veterinary clinic in East Scarp, located near Aideen's home]

EastScarpLighthouse.Name: East Scarp Lighthouse
EastScarpLighthouse.Description: The lighthouse on East Scarp Beach, kept by Beatrice. She watches over the sea from here and lights the beacon every evening to guide sailors safely.

EastScarpInn.Name: East Scarp Inn
EastScarpInn.Description: An inn in East Scarp where Corwin stays during his shore leave.

EastScarpWharf.Name: East Scarp Wharf
EastScarpWharf.Description: The wharf in East Scarp where the Toroa anchors during certain festivals.

Toroa.Name: The Toroa
Toroa.Description: An historic sailing ship refurbished by Captain Rodrique. Used for pirate-themed day trips along the coast and can be hired for parties and work events. The ship visits East Scarp wharf the day before the Flower Dance, the Luau, and the Moonlight Jellies festivals.

JacobEloiseVivienneHome.Name: Jacob, Eloise, and Vivienne's Home
JacobEloiseVivienneHome.Description: The home where Jacob (the valley's mobile veterinarian), his daughter Eloise, and his mother Vivienne live together in East Scarp, located north of Aideen's home. Also serves as Jacob's veterinary clinic.

JessiesLodgingHouse.Name: Jessie's Lodging House
JessiesLodgingHouse.Description: A lodging house in East Scarp owned and operated by Jessie, who provides shelter and guidance to young people who have lost their way. Jade and Juliet live here.

FairyPool.Name: Fairy Pool
FairyPool.Description: A magical location in the valley where Jade conducts her secret research into the mystical aspects of the area.

JaspersHouse.Name: Jasper's House
JaspersHouse.Description: Professor Jasper Thomas's home in East Scarp where he conducts his geological research and studies of the dwarves.

VictoriaHouse.Name: Victoria's House
VictoriaHouse.Description: [PLACEHOLDER - Victoria's house in East Scarp, near Aideen's home]

VetClinic.Name: Vet Clinic
VetClinic.Description: [PLACEHOLDER - Veterinary clinic in East Scarp, near Aideen's home]

BearLodge.Name: Bear Lodge
BearLodge.Description: The home of the Bear family in the main north-central area of East Scarp. Sondra, Gunnar, Gudrun, and Sig all live here together.

MateoTent.Name: Mateo's Tent
MateoTent.Description: Mateo's initial home in East Scarp, a tent where they live before moving to the Coastal Adventurer's Guild.

CoastalAdventurersGuild.Name: Coastal Adventurer's Guild
CoastalAdventurersGuild.Description: The Coastal Adventurer's Guild led by Dr. Mateo Luis. This organization helps adventurers navigate the perils of exploration in the valley. Mateo eventually moves here from their tent.

HectorTower.Name: Hector's Tower
HectorTower.Description: A tower in the Deep Mountains where Hector the druid lives in isolation with their companion Book. This reclusive shapeshifter guards the secrets of The Grove from this remote location.
